name: Trash Town
description:
An arcade-style unrealistic menial labor simulation for 1 to 2 players!
Drive your garbage (green) or recycling truck (blue) through town, gather garbage (green) or recycling (light blue), and deliver your filled truck back to the dump or recycling plant! Don't let the trash pile up, though!

  • WASD - Controls garbage truck (P1)
  • Arrow keys - Controls recycling truck (P2)

Art and Programming by William Koyama
Music by Carlo del Mundo
